Title: The Art Show
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Marta Kauffman, Howard J. Morris, David Budin (executive story editor), Brendan McCarthy (executive story editor)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Grace and Frankie try to get a bank loan to help start their new business. Frankie's art show is rife with family tensions and minor dramas.
